about_the_game:
Consumed by a mysterious fracture in the sky, you awaken on a island alongside a peculiar old man. Gather your bearings, assist him in his tasks, and obtain your first vessel as you embark on a quest to uncover the truth behind the fracture.

In Merchan'ts Voyage, immerse yourself in a sky-bound adventure filled with exploration and discovery. Navigate this floating world, build your fortune as a bustling merchant, and unravel the secrets that led to your unexpected journey.

FEATURES:

Explore!
Set sail on your ship to discover diverse islands and uncover the wonders of the vast sky!

Craft!
Gather resources to craft tools, structures, and unique merchandise that will aid you on your journey!

Build!
Enhance your vessel by adding interactive structures, creating a ship that’s uniquely yours!

Cargo!
Transport merchandise to outposts and expand your wealth as you become a successful trader!

Cook!
Collect recipes and whip up delicious meals to fuel your adventures and impress your new friends!

Customize!
Spend some of your hard earned wealth on a variety of customization options and upgrades for your vessel!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.6GHz or similar
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 700 series or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 3.3GHz or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 series or similar

short_description: Set sail in Merchants Voyage! Pilot your customizable skyship across magical islands, collect rare resources, and upgrade your vessel. Run a bustling onboard shop, attract unique customers, and build your trading empire in the skies. Adventure, trade, and conquer the clouds!
